last_episode_to_air.name: House of M
last_episode_to_air.overview: The past actions of Black Panther and the Avengers come back to haunt them.

name: Marvel's Avengers
overview: The further adventures of the Marvel Universe's mightiest general membership superhero team. With an all-star roster consisting of Iron Man, Captain America, Thor, Hulk, Hawkeye, Falcon and, occasionally--when she feels like it and only when she feels like it--Black Widow, the Avengers are a team in the truest sense. The Avengers save the world from the biggest threats imaginable--threats no single super hero could withstand.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The first half of the second season deals with the team facing Thanos, as he competes with them to obtain the Infinity Stones, followed by a five-episode arc detailing the return of Ultron, who plans to exterminate the human race. The rest of the season details the arrival of the Squadron Supreme and their confrontation with the Avengers.

seasons.name: Ultron Revolution
seasons.overview: In Season Three, Ultron returns after his apparent demise and seeks revenge on the Avengers. The Avengers must defeat him as well as new threats like Baron Zemo's Masters of Evil and Kang the Conqueror. Vision, Black Panther, Captain Marvel, Ms. Marvel, and the Inhumans will also be appearing this season.

episodes.name: The Avengers Protocol (1)
episodes.overview: When Captain America is apparently destroyed by Red Skull, Iron Man reunites the team to avenge him.

episodes.name: The Avengers Protocol (2)
episodes.overview: Red Skull steals Tony Stark's armor and The Avengers put aside their differences and stop him and M.O.D.O.K. from destroying New York City.

episodes.name: Ghost of a Chance
episodes.overview: The rookie Falcon stands alone to save his team and stop a full scale invasion of Earth after the Avengers fall victim to the body-swapping Space Phantoms.

episodes.name: The Serpent of Doom
episodes.overview: Thor believes he must sacrifice himself to save the world from Doctor Doom, who summons the Midgard Serpent using a powerful Asgardian weapon.

episodes.name: Blood Feud
episodes.overview: To save Black Widow, Captain America leads the team into battle against a former World War II ally who he struggles to convince the team is a real person.

episodes.name: Super Adaptoid
episodes.overview: The Avengers are out-gunned by the high-tech, power-mimicking Super-Adaptoid, and Captain America is the last man standing against the ultimate artificial intelligence!

episodes.name: Hyperion
episodes.overview: Hyperion arrives to save the Earth but his methods become too extreme and the Avengers must stand up to him.

episodes.name: Molecule Kid
episodes.overview: Hawkeye and Black Widow take on a covert S.H.I.E.L.D. mission to bring in the son of a super-villain, but when he is revealed to have a world-bending weapon, they realize keeping their mission a secret may be a fatal mistake.

episodes.name: Depth Charge
episodes.overview: When Attuma tries to sink Manhattan, Hulk is forced to prove his strength or perish trying.

episodes.name: The Doomstroyer
episodes.overview: Doctor Doom takes command of the Asgardian Destroyer armor and Thor has to convince the team to trust the one person who may be able to stop him, Loki!

episodes.name: Hulked Out Heroes
episodes.overview: The Avengers learn what it's like to walk a mile in Hulk's shoes when a Gamma attack by Red Skull turns them into raging monsters - the unlikely duo of Hulk and Black Widow are the last line of defense between the city and the Hulk-Vengers.

episodes.name: Avengers: Impossible!
episodes.overview: The Avengers' world is turned upside down when the shape-shifting mischief-maker Impossible Man makes Falcon the star of his own action movie, but the blockbuster puts all of Earth on the line.

episodes.name: In Deep
episodes.overview: Iron Man and Captain America disguise themselves as villains to infiltrate Red Skull's Cabal, but when their disagreements over strategy cause their cover to get blown, they're forced to take on the entire Cabal alone.

episodes.name: Hulk's Day Out
episodes.overview: When Hulk crash-lands on Earth with amnesia, The Avengers reconstruct a day-in-the-life of Hulk to find out what world-ending threat could have knocked out The Strongest There Is.

episodes.name: Planet Doom
episodes.overview: Thor returns to find Earth under the rule of Doctor Doom, who has changed the past drastically to ensure that the Avengers never formed.

episodes.name: Bring on the Bad Guys
episodes.overview: The Avengers start to see how tough the Cabal is and how much strength they'll need to take it down.

episodes.name: Savages
episodes.overview: Tony becomes too reliant on his tech so Cap challenges him to go without it for one full day.

episodes.name: Mojo World
episodes.overview: Hulk and Hawkeye suddenly find themselves stuck in a death match at the hands of the intergalactic broadcasting master, Mojo.

episodes.name: The Ambassador
episodes.overview: The Avengers put their lives at risk to protect none other than Doctor Doom.

episodes.name: All-Father's Day
episodes.overview: Odin comes to the Avengers Tower demanding his son cease his "fun" on Earth and return to Asgard. Thor promises that if he can't prove the good he does on Earth he'll return home forever.

episodes.name: By the Numbers
episodes.overview: The Avengers and the Cabal have a huge confrontation that leaves the team forever changed. Tony also learns that "the stats" can't be trusted every time -- there's no substitute for human intuition.

episodes.name: Guardians & Space Knights
episodes.overview: When Galactus attacks Earth, Iron Man is able to lead him to another planet but discovers that it is populated and under the protection of the Guardians of the Galaxy.

episodes.name: One Little Thing
episodes.overview: While Iron Man and Ant-Man are trying to stabilize particles that can shrink or grow matter, Falcon gives them terrible news -- his mom is coming to visit, and she has no idea he's an Avenger.

episodes.name: Crime and Circuses
episodes.overview: When the Circus of Crime rolls into town, Hawkeye's dark past begins to surface and puts the Avengers in danger.

episodes.name: Exodus
episodes.overview: Iron Man's confidence is shaken after he inadvertently puts Falcon in harm's way. When the Cabal pulls the trigger on its final plan, Tony has to put aside his personal dilemma and be the leader he was born to be.

episodes.name: The Final Showdown
episodes.overview: With the Tesseract now in the hands of the Cosmic Skull, the world is in catastrophic peril. Iron Man realizes teaming up with the rest of the Cabal might be their only chance for victory.

episodes.name: The Arsenal
episodes.overview: When Red Skull comes crashing to Earth with a fleet of alien ships chasing him, the Avengers learn there's a villain in their midst a thousand times more dangerous than the Cabal ever was: Thanos! Earth's Mightiest Heroes are forced to face the fact they're big fish in a small pond -- and this new villain wants to conquer the entire ocean! Will the mightiest superheroes on Earth be able to stop the super-villain of the galaxy... before he succeeds in becoming all-powerful?

episodes.name: Thanos Rising
episodes.overview: With the help of Arsenal, a robot created by Howard Stark for Tony, the Avengers must stop Thanos from gaining the Power Stone - an energy force so powerful that it could cause mass destruction.

episodes.name: Valhalla Can Wait
episodes.overview: Hulk and Thor are tricked into a battle and transported to Valhalla to find out who is the strongest, once and for all. But under Hela's rule, only the loser of their contest may return to Earth while the winner will become her consort and champion.

episodes.name: Ghosts of the Past
episodes.overview: Red Skull has information that could help the Avengers save the world from Thanos, but an intruder kidnaps Skull before they can retrieve it. Cap discovers that the trespasser is none other than his old partner Bucky Barnes, now the Winter Soldier, who's back and seeks revenge.

episodes.name: Beneath the Surface
episodes.overview: When Hawkeye and Black Widow stumble upon the Serpent Crown, they must work together to stop Attuma's battalion from destroying Atlantis.

episodes.name: Nighthawk
episodes.overview: When a mysterious new villain uses the individualized counter measures Falcon created when he was at S.H.I.E.L.D. to take out the Avengers one by one, he must figure out a way to save his team.

episodes.name: The Age of Tony Stark
episodes.overview: When the Time Stone becomes attached to Tony's arc reactor, it causes him to de-age and brings dangers from other eras, including dinosaurs, into present-day New York City.

episodes.name: Head to Head
episodes.overview: Tony believes the Avengers have reached the pinnacle of perfection, but when M.O.D.O.K. uses the Mind Stone to assume control of S.H.I.E.L.D., the team is put to the test as they are forced to swap minds.

episodes.name: The Dark Avengers
episodes.overview: In a 'flipped reality,' the Avengers discover that their world has been reshaped by the Reality Stone, wielded by the Squadron Supreme. In this new reality the Squadron Supreme have made themselves the heroes and the Avengers the villains! Find out if the Avengers can take down the Squadron Supreme and prove that they're the real heroes.

episodes.name: Back to the Learning Hall
episodes.overview: When Thor is tricked into returning to Asgard, he and the Avengers discover they must defeat Loki and prevent Earth and Asgard from crashing into one another and foil Loki's plan to escape Valhalla and seek revenge on his brother.

episodes.name: Downgraded
episodes.overview: Stranded without his gear in a dangerous realm where technology doesn't work, Falcon must prove to himself and a skeptical Hawkeye that he's still a hero.

episodes.name: Widow's Run
episodes.overview: The Avengers must protect Widow and Thor as they carry out Widow's plan to rid the Earth of the Infinity Stones before Thanos arrives to claim them and control the Universe.

episodes.name: Thanos Triumphant
episodes.overview: With the power and might of all five Infinity Stones finally in his gauntlet, Thanos plans to wield his power over the Universe while the Avengers make a desperate attempt to stop him.

episodes.name: Crack in the System
episodes.overview: Iron Man and Captain America try to rebuild their relationship, until Cap discovers Iron Man's hiding dangerous information about an artificial intelligence unit named Ultron.

episodes.name: Avengers Disassembled
episodes.overview: An even more powerful Ultron resurfaces and takes control of Avengers Tower and Iron Man's Hall of Armors, leading to the destruction of the Avengers as we know them.

episodes.name: Small Time Heroes
episodes.overview: With the team divided and the Avengers Tower wiped out, Tony seeks help from Ant-Man. Learning he's busy fighting MODOK, Tony's team joins Ant-Man to stop the Pym Particle thief.

episodes.name: Secret Avengers
episodes.overview: Working for S.H.I.E.L.D. isn't everything Captain America's team had hoped when they're expected to unquestionably follow orders involving the Crimson Dynamo and The Winter Guard.

episodes.name: The Ultron Outbreak
episodes.overview: The Avengers reunite when Captain America and Iron Man learn to appreciate their differences while trying to save the world from ultimate destruction at the hands of Ultron!

episodes.name: The New Guy
episodes.overview: When Ant-Man joins the Avengers, Hawkeye resigns and trains his replacement on Monster Island, unaware that Red Skull is nearby planning to cloak himself using Dormammu's powers!

episodes.name: Terminal Velocity
episodes.overview: The Squadron Supreme's fastest member Speed Demon is on the loose and wreaking havoc throughout Avengers Tower. Hulk must save the day by fighting the high velocity villain. Meanwhile, the other Avengers face off against Hyperion.

episodes.name: Spectrums
episodes.overview: New Avenger, Ant-Man, begins to atone by bringing his former allies to justice. His quest for redemption leads the team to an epic battle with Squadron Supreme's Dr. Spectrum.

episodes.name: Midgard Crisis
episodes.overview: Thor is convinced that Zarda wants to defect from Squadron Supreme, but Hulk knows better and must protect Thor from Zarda's duplicitous ways.

episodes.name: Avengers' Last Stand
episodes.overview: Falcon tries to prove he can be a leader when the Squadron Supreme enacts their end game and kidnaps Captain America and Tony. Things become even more difficult when the Avengers discover the Squadron Supreme's last few plots were all part of an even bigger plan to revive their previously unknown sixth member named Nuke.

episodes.name: Avengers Underground
episodes.overview: Unbeknownst to the Squadron and the rest of the world, the Avengers are in hiding and working on a plan to save the planet and stop the Squadron Supreme once and for all!

episodes.name: New Frontiers
episodes.overview: When an alien race begs the Avengers to save them from mysterious invaders, the team discovers that a recently-escaped Thanos and his Black Order are plundering the planet. Meanwhile, Tony seeks new challenges for the team.

episodes.name: Avengers World
episodes.overview: When Thanos attacks Earth, planning to finally take over the planet by destroying the Avengers, the team discovers they are more than eight heroes - they are an ideal.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: The first half of the second season deals with the team facing Thanos, as he competes with them to obtain the Infinity Stones, followed by a five-episode arc detailing the return of Ultron, who plans to exterminate the human race. The rest of the season details the arrival of the Squadron Supreme and their confrontation with the Avengers.

episodes.name: Adapting to Change
episodes.overview: The Avengers learn what it's like to work as a team again as they battle a new and improved Super Adaptoid that was developed by A.I.M.'s Scientist Supreme.

episodes.name: The Ultimates
episodes.overview: Ultron is back and plans to replace humanity with robots known as Ultimates.

episodes.name: Saving Captain Rogers
episodes.overview: Captain America battles to rescue Winter Soldier who has been captured by Baron Zemo.

episodes.name: Under Siege
episodes.overview: Hawkeye must defend the Avengers Tower from Baron Zemo who has taken the Masters of Evil members Beetle, Fixer, Goliath, Moonstone, and Screaming Mimi under his leadership.

episodes.name: The Thunderbolts
episodes.overview: The Avengers fight to stop Justin Hammer’s new weapons factories, but are both helped and hindered by a mysterious new team of heroes known as the Thunderbolts.

episodes.name: Thunderbolts Revealed
episodes.overview: When the Avengers discover that the Thunderbolts are actually the Masters of Evil, they must decide whether they can trust the villainous team to turn on their leader, Baron Zemo.

episodes.name: Into the Dark Dimension
episodes.overview: Dr. Strange needs the Avengers' help when Dormammu steals the Eye of Agamotto.

episodes.name: Dehulked
episodes.overview: Hulk is drained of his gamma radiation and stuck as Bruce Banner.

episodes.name: Inhumans Among Us
episodes.overview: When townspeople transform into primitive creatures, the Avengers attempt to help them by putting themselves into conflict with the Inhumans.

episodes.name: The Inhuman Condition
episodes.overview: The Avengers must team up with the Inhumans to stop their old foe, Ultron, who plans to unleash a dangerous weapon upon Earth.

episodes.name: The Kids Are Alright
episodes.overview: Captain America and Iron Man must partner with new and young Inhumans - Inferno and Ms. Marvel - to stop another Inhuman, The Ghost, from stealing Friday.

episodes.name: The Conqueror
episodes.overview: The Avengers try to stop AIM from stealing high-tech weapons from the future, which attracts the attention of the 30th Century warlord - Kang the Conqueror!

episodes.name: Into The Future
episodes.overview: With the exception of Thor, the Avengers become trapped in the 30th century and must beat Kang the Conqueror to find their way back to their own time.

episodes.name: Seeing Double
episodes.overview: Black Widow comes face-to-face with Yelena Belova, who in her determination to create the ultimate weapon turns Hulk into the Winter Hulk.

episodes.name: A Friend in Need
episodes.overview: Thor teaches the Vision the value of friendship by taking him to Asgard where together they must fight an Ultron-controlled Destroyer.

episodes.name: Captain Marvel
episodes.overview: The Avengers join Captain Marvel in a fight to stop a powerful sentient spaceship from destroying Earth.

episodes.name: Panther's Rage
episodes.overview: Speaking before The General Assembly of The United Nations, Black Panther is targeted by Crossbones... and has issue with Captain America's possession of vibranium!

episodes.name: Ant-Man Makes It Big
episodes.overview: On the set of a superhero motion picture, the Avengers team up with Ant-Man to stop the madman Egghead from destroying Los Angeles.

episodes.name: The House of Zemo
episodes.overview: Baron Zemo returns to target the Avengers alongside his father, whom he's brought back from the 1940s.

episodes.name: U-Foes
episodes.overview: The President has signed the New Powers Act in response to the Terrigen Fog creating new Inhumans and Truman Marsh is assigned to be the Avengers liaison to the government. Meanwhile, scientists backed by HYDRA enter a gamma storm with a stolen spaceship and are transformed into the U-Foes where they plan to take over HYDRA when Baron Strucker hasn't returned.

episodes.name: Building the Perfect Weapon
episodes.overview: Following Truman Marsh replacing Hulk with Red Hulk, the Avengers must stop Leader from building and unleashing his secret weapon.

episodes.name: World War Hulk
episodes.overview: The Avengers must stop an out-of-control Red Hulk as he threatens to destroy an entire town.

episodes.name: Civil War (1): The Fall of Attilan
episodes.overview: The Avengers must stop Maximus from wreaking havoc in Attilan and causing its citizens to lose control of their powers.

episodes.name: Civil War (2): The Mighty Avengers
episodes.overview: With the Avengers disbanded, a new team - the Mighty Avengers - steps in to take their place.

episodes.name: Civil War (3): The Drums of War
episodes.overview: When the Inhumans are mind-controlled into attacking innocent humans, the Avengers must find a way to override their control and end the war.

episodes.name: Civil War (4): Avengers Revolution
episodes.overview: The Avengers, old and new, must find a way to free the Inhumans and the world from Ultron's control.

3.name: Ultron Revolution
3.overview: In Season Three, Ultron returns after his apparent demise and seeks revenge on the Avengers. The Avengers must defeat him as well as new threats like Baron Zemo's Masters of Evil and Kang the Conqueror. Vision, Black Panther, Captain Marvel, Ms. Marvel, and the Inhumans will also be appearing this season.

episodes.name: Avengers No More (1)
episodes.overview: The team battles against The Leader and his new cabal.

episodes.name: Avengers No More (2)
episodes.overview: Black Panther must assemble a new team of Avengers.

episodes.name: The Sleeper Awakens
episodes.overview: Red Skull loses control of his doomsday sleeper robots and it's up to the new Avengers to stop them.

episodes.name: Prison Break
episodes.overview: It's up to Captain Marvel to stop Crimson Widow, Typhoid Mary and Zarda from breaking out of the vault.

episodes.name: The Incredible Herc
episodes.overview: Hercules joins the new Avengers but he hasn't told the truth about why he's in New York City.

episodes.name: Show Your Work
episodes.overview: The new Avengers form an unlikely alliance with Taskmaster to stop MODOK from destroying the earth.

episodes.name: Sneakers
episodes.overview: Baron Zemo is out to obtain a mysterious object from Wakanda. It's up to Black Panther and Ant-Man to stop him.

episodes.name: Why I Hate Halloween
episodes.overview: The Avengers must protect a Hydra scientist from the vengeful forces of Dracula and his vampires.

episodes.name: The Once and Future Kang
episodes.overview: Vision and Wasp head to the future to save Falcon, who has joined forces with Kang the Conqueror.

episodes.name: Dimension Z
episodes.overview: Ant-Man travels to another dimension to rescue Black Widow, Captain America, and Hawkeye from Arnim Zola.

episodes.name: The Most Dangerous Hunt
episodes.overview: In the Asgardian wilderness, Black Panther and Hulk find themselves chained together and on the run from Skurge.

episodes.name: Under the Spell of the Enchantress
episodes.overview: Captain Marvel and Ms. Marvel travel to an icy asteroid to rescue Thor from the Enchantress.

episodes.name: The Return
episodes.overview: The Avengers discover the Earth has been taken over by Loki.

episodes.name: New Year's Resolution
episodes.overview: Past and present collide as Howard Stark and Peggy Carter team up with Iron Man and Captain America to save the time stream from Kang the Conqueror.

episodes.name: The Eye of Agamotto (1)
episodes.overview: The vengeful Agamotto attacks the Avengers and attempts to take back the Eye of Agamotto!

episodes.name: The Eye of Agamotto (2)
episodes.overview: The vengeful Agamotto attacks the Avengers and attempts to take back the Eye of Agamotto!

episodes.name: Beyond
episodes.overview: After the Avengers are transported to a strange new world, Captain America and Black Widow find Iron Man and battle the mysterious Moon Knight.

episodes.name: Underworld
episodes.overview: As they search for the Bifrost and a way to undo Battleworld, the Avengers must battle the Enchantress.

episodes.name: The Immortal Weapon
episodes.overview: While trying to retrieve Heimdall's sword, Black Panther and Falcon team up with Iron Fist to overcome symbiote-powered Dracula and his vampires.

episodes.name: The Vibranium Coast
episodes.overview: Ant-Man and Ms. Marvel must team up with the pirate Typhoid Mary to battle Red Skull and Crossbones

episodes.name: Weirdworld
episodes.overview: Black Widow and Captain Marvel must stop the now-separated Bruce Banner and Hulk from hurting each other, while fighting the evil Morgan Le Fay.

episodes.name: Westland
episodes.overview: Hawkeye, Vision and Wasp head to the old West world of 1872 to find Doctor Strange.

episodes.name: The Citadel
episodes.overview: Captain America and Iron Man are captured by the Beyonder and the villain team he has assembled.

episodes.name: The Wastelands
episodes.overview: Before they can use the Bifrost to undo Battleworld, the Avengers must defeat the Beyonder's forces, Ares and an army of Ghost Riders.

episodes.name: All Things Must End
episodes.overview: After Loki becomes the Sorcerer Supreme, the Avengers are the only thing standing between him and the domination of the universe.

episodes.name: Shadow of Atlantis (1)
episodes.overview: Black Panther and the Avengers must defend New York City from an invasion of monsters.

episodes.name: Shadow of Atlantis (2)
episodes.overview: Black Panther and the Avengers battle to stop the invasion of New York.

episodes.name: Into the Deep
episodes.overview: Black Panther and his sister Shuri undertake a dangerous mission to sneak into the undersea kingdom of Atlantis.

episodes.name: The Panther and the Wolf
episodes.overview: To uncover enemies within Wakanda, Black Panther and Shuri cross paths with someone from their past.

episodes.name: Mists of Attilan
episodes.overview: Black Panther and Ms. Marvel head to the inhuman city of Attilan on a secret mission.

episodes.name: T'Challa Royale
episodes.overview: Black Panther finds himself trapped on a tropical island, hunted by Kraven the Hunter.

episodes.name: The Night Has Wings
episodes.overview: Black Panther travels to a rural village in Wakanda to investigate a series of mysterious monster attacks.

episodes.name: Mask of the Panther
episodes.overview: Black Panther discovers a relic of ancient Wakanda that helps him continue his quest for answers.

episodes.name: The Good Son
episodes.overview: The key to Black Panther's quest is stolen and he must recover it before it leaves Wakanda.

episodes.name: The Lost Temple
episodes.overview: Black Panther and his allies finally discover the artifact they have been searching for.

episodes.name: Descent of the Shadow
episodes.overview: Black Panther and the Avengers work together to protect New York City from a new threat.

episodes.name: The Last Avenger
episodes.overview: All on his own, Black Panther must safeguard a dangerous weapon from all who might try to stop him.

episodes.name: The Vibranium Curtain (1)
episodes.overview: Black Panther devises a plan to get the information he needs, but he isn't the only one with a plan.

guest_stars.character: Ant-Man / Computer Alert Voice / Male Reporter (voice)
guest_stars.name: Josh Keaton

episodes.name: The Vibranium Curtain (2)
episodes.overview: Captured by his enemies, Black Panther discovers an unlikely ally.

episodes.name: T’Chanda
episodes.overview: Black Panther uncovers secrets about his grandfather, T’Chanda.

episodes.name: Yemandi
episodes.overview: Black Panther discovers secrets about his ancestor, Yemandi.

episodes.name: Bashenga
episodes.overview: Black Panther discovers secrets about his ancestor, Bashenga, the founder of Wakanda.

episodes.name: King Breaker (1)
episodes.overview: Black Panther must go behind enemy lines to save his foes from an even bigger threat.

episodes.name: King Breaker (2)
episodes.overview: With an attack coming from multiple sides, Black Panther turns to help from an unlikely source.

episodes.name: Widowmaker
episodes.overview: Black Panther explores a secret enemy facility with a nefarious past.

episodes.name: Atlantis Attacks
episodes.overview: All of Black Panther's efforts to protect Wakanda are thrown into jeopardy by a new foe.

episodes.name: House of M
episodes.overview: The past actions of Black Panther and the Avengers come back to haunt them.
